commit message:
Improved search threads handling for better overall performance.
Better http timeout for web search performers.
Fixed KAT (can't handle https).
Version bump to 0.9.6 and improved metadata support when being browsed via HTTP

Better experience in search.
* Searching progress dialog will not dissapear ahead of time and it's cancellable.
* More space to click on the search icon with your finger so that you don't delete your search keywords by mistake if you have fat fingers.
* Uses touch listener on file type selection since click listener was sketchy.
* FrostClick promotions now support HTTP downloads.
* Correct cancellation of Download Torrent Tasks when another search is fired or a current search is cancelled.
